# Staking the BlockForge Battle Pass

To utilize the full benefits of a Battle Pass, the NFT must first be staked in our Ethereum contract. When a user stakes a Battle Pass, they will receive a Staked Battle Pass in return.

See the Battle Pass NFT section for more information about the utility of a Staked Battle Pass.

# Staked VS. Non-Staked Battle Pass

A visual representation of the difference between the Staked Battle Pass and Non-staked Battle Pass.

# How to Stake

To Stake a battle pass, visit the BlockForgeNFT.xyz website, sign in with with a web3 wallet, and go to the Dashboard. If the connected wallet contains a Battle Pass NFT, then it will appear under Battle Passes

# How to Unstake

Owners can Unstake their BlockForge Pass at any time to obtain their original pass token back from the staking contract(where it was stored safely) and transfer back the staked pass token for burning
